members.description: The highway match classifier to use. This should only be used for testing and debugging.
members.name: Conflate Match Highway Classifier

members.description: List of MatchCreators to use during conflation. This can modify what features will be conflated (e.g. buildings, roads, etc.).
members.name: Match Creator

members.description: List of MergerCreators to use during conflation. This can modify what features will be conflated (e.g. buildings, roads, etc.).
members.name: Merger Creator

members.description: List of MatchCreators to use during conflation. This can modify what features will be conflated (e.g. buildings, roads, etc.).
members.name: Match Creator

members.description: List of MergerCreators to use during conflation. This can modify what features will be conflated (e.g. buildings, roads, etc.).
members.name: Merger Creator

members.description: If highways are smaller than threshold and the tags matched then they will be merged together into a single way.
members.name: Small Way Merger Threshold
